events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been classified under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to assist you through the hiring process for the engineering role you applied to.
Our initial screening call will take place tomorrow to discuss your background and fit for the software engineering role.
Thank you for the screening invitation. I am confirming my availability and look forward to speaking with the team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 9:00 AM to evaluate your problem-solving skills and coding experience.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software architecture and algorithms.
Your HR interview has been set for May 15th, where we will discuss your cultural fit and employment terms.
The HR interview went well, and we are pleased to proceed with next steps for the software engineer role.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position outlining salary, benefits, and start date.
Thank you for the prompt response and positive feedback regarding the offer and proposed employment terms.
You have accepted our offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to our internal systems, welcome materials, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now complete. We look forward to your contributions.
